thread.section_title: Nengun Performance評価／レビュー | お客様は Nengun Performanceの評価／レビューをしました。 | nengun.com
thread.title: tastetickles
thread.title_full: Nengun Performance について 投稿者 tastetickles

author: tastetickles
title: tastetickles
text: Back and forth email took a while for nengun to respond but I assume it's because there's too many emails to go through by their staff. However they do reply emails on weekends including Sunday so that's fantastic. My order of wheels took a month but that's due to it being discontinued by manufacturer. Items eventually arrived in great packaging and fast delivery with great pricing. I would recommend to others no doubt.
